author: Lori Keong
title: From The Strategist: The 29 Best Small-Apartment Organization Ideas
description: Our friends at The Strategist reviewed the best small-apartment organization ideas, according to professional organizers, including ideas for the entryway, the living room, and the kitchen.
content:
From our friends at The Strategist, the best small-apartment organization ideas, according to professional organizers
